title: How exactly Hex editor is used?
content:
I'm new to reverse engineering. So I decided to start with some game files in my computer. The main goal was to understand how hex editor used to identify files and extract needed data.

In my case I have 2 .ebx files and Chunk ID file. The goal is to use the ebx to extract the data in the chunk file but I am confused. I used 010 editor template to see whether it will find any wav/mp3 data, and it did. I appreciate if someone can explain some of the stuff here and give me some good tuts where I can learn this kind reversal?

Chunk ID file

Ebx File audio
